overview:
Freddie Pikovsky is a serial entrepreneur from Brooklyn, NY. Freddie is the Co-founder/CEO at Off Track Planet, Chief Organizer at the DUMBO Startup Lab and advisor to MatchPuppy.com.

Off Track Planet is a travel media company based in New York City, reaching over 2 million, 18-30 year old readers a year online and in-print. It was founded by Freddie Pikovsky while living at a hostel in 2009 after a “life changing trip abroad”. He is considered to be the companies visionary and brand building force. OTP is syndicate partners with the Huffington Post and previously distributed in-print to over 300 Barnes & Nobles across the U.S. with an online community of over 100k followers. OTP was also a launch pad for the social hostel booking site, WeHostels.com.

The DUMBO Startup Lab is a 2,300 sq. ft. loft located in Brooklyn (DUMBO), NY. It is an incubator for entrepreneurs focused in tech, innovation and design. Freddie Pikovsky found DSL after his experience working from a government funded incubator program in Santiago, Chile. DSL provides an educational, collaborative and accelerated environment for startup companies based in NYC.

milestones.description: Chief Organizer at DUMBO Startup Lab
milestones.source_description: DUMBO Startup Lab gives tech entrepreneurs a leg up
